title: Pilot Circling in North Mississippi Threatening to Crash Into a Walmart; Governor calls it a dangerous situation, people told to avoid the area
text:
About 5 a.m. Central, a person claiming to be the pilot called 911 and threatened to crash into a Walmart, police said. Police evacuated the store and officers were communicating with the pilot, police said.

"Citizens are asked to avoid that area until an all clear is given," Tupelo police said. "With the mobility of an airplane of that type the danger zone is much larger than even Tupelo."

Write to Cameron McWhirter at cameron.mcwhirter@wsj.com

Pilot Circling in North Mississippi Threatening to Crash Into a Walmart
